mapper.select:
select distinct substr(A.bookid,1, instr(A.bookid,'-',1,2)-1 ) as bookid, A.idx, title, author, status, agecode ,gcode_fk, gname,ncode_fk, nname,lcode_fk, lname,fcode_fk, fname,ccode_fk, cname ,libcode_fk, libname ,pubcode_fk, pubname from book A join genre G on A.gcode_fk = G.gcode join nation N on A.ncode_fk = N.ncode join language L on A.lcode_fk = L.lcode join field F on A.fcode_fk = F.fcode join category C on A.ccode_fk = C.ccode join library LIB on A.libcode_fk = LIB.libcode join publisher P on A.pubcode_fk = P.pubcode where status != 4
and libcode_fk in (#{LIBRARY})
and ccode_fk in (#{CATEGORY})
and lcode_fk in (#{LANGUAGE})
and fcode_fk in (#{FIELD})
order by #{SORT};
